title: Made a meme about a NonMuslim Politician, sinful?
transcript: Muhammad from Canada uh so there's a political leader in my country and that particular leader is extremely I mean they're very anti-islamic so a few days ago I made a meme regarding them and I called them overweight in that Meme and that Meme went viral but now I'm realizing if I a sin or not and it's been 3 to four days and not been able to get this thought out of my mind is no no they're not Muslim no problem inshallah just try not to be caught very simple
